comments:
Hi there. 

I use Eclipse 3.0 / Lomboz 3.01 ( with the right emf-sdo) / JDK 1.5.0 

I mention that I don't have any other plugin installed. 

I have a problem when I add a new servlet using the wizard. 
When I hit the Finish button, the window freeze for a few seconds, and after 
that, the new source (of the servlet) is opened in the background, the window 
unfreeze, but it's not closed. When I hit Finish again, the window closes. 
BUT... when I examine the web.xml, the reference to the new servlet is not 
added. 

In the log of Eclipse I found this exception trace:

Thanks!

This is a known bug with Lomboz. This defect is tracked in
https://forge.objectweb.org/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=300636&group_id=97&atid=100097.

I am closing this bug because it is a bug in Lomboz (and a known one), but not 
a bug in the _current_ WTP code.

Marking as verified as I know this issue is fixed (or correctly categorized).
If, as originator, you disagree or still see, please re-open, or open a new bug. 

Thanks very much for reporting and helping make WTP better.
